title: Riak Recap for July 27 - 28
description:
Posted on July 29, 2011

Afternoon, Evening, Morning to All -

Short Recap for today.

Enjoy and have a great weekend.

Mark

Riak Recap for July 27 – 28

  1. Last reminder to register for the “Riak and Python” webinar happening on August 2nd. (If you don’t register, you run the risk of hurting Mathias’ feelings).
    → Details here
  2. Kresten Krab Thorup’s talk from Erlang Factory London about his Riak Mobile project is now available in video form.
    → Watch here
  3. Looks like Riak will be one of the topics at the next Ruby Meetup happening in Colima, Mexico.
    → Details here
  4. Q – Is it possible to add data to a key in riak? (from doki_pen via #riak)
    A – No. You’ll always have to fetch, update, and store the object.
